name: Cubic Rush (Sniperzila)
description:
NOTE: I know this game looks like the Brackeys Cube Game but I made it from scratch without any tutorials from Brackeys, thanks for undestanding.

CUBIC RUSH is a game where you play as a cube and you try to dodge obstacles and complete the levels. I will try to solve all the bugs that occur, sorry for the inconvenience. CREDITS: Owner - Sniperzila Programmer - Sniperzila Music - ROY - Lost In Sound(Magic Release)
